text.__SUMMARY__: Lithocarpus maingayi is a species of plant in the family Fagaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Chua, L.S.L. (1998). "Lithocarpus maingayi". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31502A9637283. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31502A9637283.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
